Product Sourcing

We specialize in sourcing high-quality tableware, glassware, kitchenware, and guest amenities tailored to your brand and budget.

Customization

Offer bespoke solutions, including custom branding on products to enhance your establishment's identity.

Consultation

Our experts provide consultation services to help you select the perfect products that align with your concept and operational needs.

Our Solutions

Basic

Discover the timeless elegance of our Basic Chinaware collection—crafted from high-quality porcelain for everyday dining and special occasions alike.

Decor

Elevate your table with our Decor Chinaware collection, where artistry meets function in every hand-painted motif.

Cultery

Complete your table setting with our Premium Cutlery collection, where modern design meets exceptional craftsmanship.

Glassware

Elevate every toast with our Artisan Glassware collection, where contemporary form meets timeless elegance.

Kitchenware

High-performance stainless-steel pans, triple-enameled cast-iron pots on wooden bases, and olive-wood cutting boards—durable, easy-clean, and endlessly versatile.

Buffetware

Modular stainless-steel buffet stations on casters—hot wells, induction zones, chopping units, serving counters—snap together for a durable, hygienic, fully mobile setup that makes events effortless.

Room Linen

Refresh your space with our Room Linen collection—from crisp, classic whites to rich, on-trend colors.

Guest Amenities

Welcome your guests with our elegant Guest Amenities collection—featuring plush towels, stylish trays, and thoughtfully selected accents that combine functionality with refined design.

Premium hospitality and home-décor supplier established in 2015, delivering exceptional quality and service.
